general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Wis. Stat. 66.0401 voids restrictions that prevent solar energy systems. Milwaukee amended ordinances to comply.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available with We Energies, Madison Gas & Electric, and other utilities.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Wis. Stat. 66.0401 prohibits restrictions preventing solar installations.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 90-100 mph.

licensing.license_type: Wisconsin DSPS licensed electrician or contractor required.

notes: State statute strongly protects solar rights. Some SolarAPP+ adoption. Milwaukee has streamlined process. Focus on Energy rebates available.
